大家好，

天下雜誌和英國標準協會（BSI）共同打造推出：BSI X 天下學習 ESG線上人才認證─永續系列 企業減碳淨零策略規劃課程，結合線上課程及線下實體測驗的方式，成為國際認証的第一流永續人才。

課程資訊詳如附件。有意參加者，煩請自行報名。謝謝。

Dear all,

CommonWealth Magazine and the British Standards Institution (BSI) have joined forces to introduce the BSI X CommonWealth Learning ESG Online Talent Certification - Sustainable Series. This program includes a course on corporate carbon reduction and net-zero strategy planning. What sets it apart is the combination of online courses with offline assessments, making it a premier international certification for sustainability professionals.

For more details about the course, please refer to the attached document. If this opportunity aligns with your interests, feel free to register at your convenience. Thank you very much.
